pending.title: Subchain as a Service
pending.text: We are in discussion with various coins about integrations with our Subchain and Navtech system.

inProgress.title: Web Wallet
inProgress.text: An X13 capable, custom Electrum server that can create fully-qualified wallets, and will be released with the option for self-hosting. The NAV team will provide a website and service integration support if you need.

inProgress.title: Raspberry Pi Staking Unit
inProgress.text: A low-energy NAV PoS Staking solution based on the Raspberry-Pi platform. NAV’s highly  anticipated touch-screen staking unit, offers a more energy efficient way to setup wallet  a address, view your balance, and an easy to use withdraw option.

inProgress.title: Decentralization Implementation
inProgress.text: The release of the new Navtech value-transfer system, was a key piece of the decentralization network implementation. The new architecture allows Navtech servers to operate in trusted clusters and form their own private mesh network of processing servers which anyone will be able to run and earn rewards from.

inProgress.title: Official Promotional Video
inProgress.text: We will make a short video, which will summarise all features of Navajo Coin and explain it's Anonymous Technology to viewers in easy way. This will attract more average users and investors to Navajo Coin.

inProgress.title: iOS Nav Ticker
inProgress.text: We will be releasing Nav price tickers for Android and iOS so you can check the value of your investment on the move.

inProgress.title: Mobile iOS Wallet
inProgress.text: We are building an iOS wallet for Nav Coin. Users will be able to send and receive NAV using the iOS device of their choice. This wallet will run using the same Electrum server as the Android wallet.

inProgress.title: Android Anon Send and Staking Wallet
inProgress.text: We are building a full node wallet for Android. This wallet is based on the QT version of the full node wallet and will be able to stake NAV and send Anonymous Transactions from your mobile!

inProgress.title: Nav Coin China
inProgress.text: After meeting a group of Business Leaders in Kuala Lumpur, Nav Coin is working towards entering the Chinese Market. We are collaborating with marketing teams from China on Mandarin transations of our website, press releases and wallet along with listings on Chinese Exchanges and CNY pairing.

complete.title: Anonymous Merchant Integration
complete.text: Once we have finished the initial merchant gateway, we will integrate the merchant gateway with our anonymous network to allow for the anonymous purchasing of products.

complete.title: Merchant Gateway
complete.text: Nav Coin has been added to Coin Payments merchant gateway system. This allows merchants to accept Nav Coin in their physical stores and also on their websites.

complete.title: Android Nav Ticker
complete.text: We will be releasing Nav price tickers for Android and iOS so you can check the value of your investment on the move.

complete.title: Thin Client for Desktop
complete.text: Our custom X13 Electrum server also enables us to build a thin client for desktop. This will be a great addition to the Nav Coin software suite and give people instant access to their Nav Coin without having to sync the entire block chain!

complete.title: Mobile Wallet
complete.text: We are building a mobile NAV wallet initially for Android. This will be a fully qualified wallet with the coins stored on your device. When we release our mobile wallet we will in a very small club of Proof of Stake coins with a mobile wallet. Phase 2 of the mobile wallet the NAV Coin dev team will unlocked a massive milestone; World’s first anonymous cryptocurrency transaction using a mobile phone!

complete.title: Hierarchical Deterministic Wallet Implementaion
complete.text: Based on Bitcoin's BIP32 implementation, this will allow users to send & receive their NAV coins without needing to store the entire blockchain, simply using their mobile devices or a web wallet.

complete.title: NAV Anonymous Challenge
complete.text: We will reinstate the bounty which was offered to anyone who can crack the anonymous network. The previous bount was unclaimed and this fact backs up our confidence that our system is unbreakable

complete.title: Decentralization Research & Development
complete.text: The Research & Development phase of the anonymous decentralization has been completed. The white paper has now been released to the public, press releases sent and NIP1 has been initialized in github.

complete.title: Raspberry Pi Staking Unit Beta
complete.text: The Beta version of the Raspberry Pi image used on the staking devices is ready to be distributed for testing.

complete.title: Press Releases and new Marketing Material
complete.text: We are working on improving our marketing strategy: Press releases, new & simple white paper as well as infographic are being prepared.

complete.title: Navajo Coin Redesign
complete.text: We have decided that Navajo Coin needs new, fresh and more professional look including NAV logo, announcement's OP and wallet design.

complete.title: Official Forum
complete.text: We will launch a dedicated forum for Navajo Coin. Every cryptocurrency needs a place where their developers and supporters can meet, without fudders or trolls.

complete.title: Official Navajo Coin Multipool
complete.text: Multipool will allow all miners to get paid in NAV by mining the current most profitable POW coins. In result there will be more buy support on exchanges.

complete.title: Anonymous Transaction Refinement
complete.text: We have deployed our upgrades to the Navajo Anonymous Network. Including restructuring of the sending algorithm to be more efficient. Some of these algorithm improvements are also steps towards making the anon nodes re-distributable. Adding extra error catching, around what happens if the node is unable to decipher the encrypted destination. The node will now return the coins to the sender if it is unable to decrypt and verify the destination address at the entry node. Rather than rounding the final transaction amounts to factors of 10, it now will send the amounts to the final destination in a randomly selected amount of transactions, each with randomly allocated amounts to help obscure the transactions further.

complete.title: Anonymous Transactions Public Release
complete.text: With the main block chain successfully hard forked, the network stabilised and the major exchanges successfully running on the new wallet we are able to move forward into the final stage of deployment. The double encrypted Navajo Anonymous network will be fully functional and open to the public from Monday 23rd of March 2015.

complete.title: Anonymous Transactions Hard Fork
complete.text: We are very pleased to announce the start of the release phase for our Anonymous Technology to the Main NAV Block Chain! Since the success of the unencrypted beta test of the transaction infrastructure, the Dev team has been busily working, adding the asymmetric double encryption to the anonymous system as well as SSL across all of the network nodes. We will be ready to hardfork the main block chain on the 9th of March 2015!

complete.title: Anonymous Transactions Beta Test
complete.text: The public beta test of our Navajo Anonymous Transactions system will begin on the 1st of February 2015. It will run for two weeks at which point it will close and we will begin processing the beta results. During the testing phase there will be a bounty set for anyone who can successfully trace the transactions from origin to destination. The beta test will be unencrypted to help us with analysis and testing.

complete.title: Anonymous Technology - Testing Phase
complete.text: Our Anonymous Technology is now in Testing Phase! We are working on releasing the system in the Beta Network on January 2015.

complete.title: Market Ticker & Staking Calculator
complete.text: We have added two new features to the wallet. First is the market ticker which lets you know in real time the price of NAV/BTC. Second one is the Staking Calculator which can show you how much free NAV you have earned from staking over the last day, week and month.

complete.title: Improved Chat Feature
complete.text: New version of the Chat feature with improved and new features.

complete.title: Navajo Faucet
complete.text: We will be adding a Navajo faucet to the website. You will be able to register your wallet address with the faucet and be in the lottery to get sent free NAVs.

complete.title: Beta Wallet Messaging System
complete.text: In October we will be releasing the 3rd iteration of the beta wallet. This stage focuses on amends to the chat client's functionality. As this is being tested by the community we will continue to apply feedback from the previous rounds and work towards the next stage of the beta client.

complete.title: Block Explorer & Rich List
complete.text: We will be adding a Block Explorer and a Rich List to the Navajo Coin website. The block explorer allows people to look up wallet addresses and see its public balance and transactions.

complete.title: Beta Wallet User Interface Update
complete.text: With the first round of feedback collated from the Beta test, we will begin to release updates to the beta wallet in stages. The first stage focuses on amends to the user interface. Round two of the testing and feedback will commence while work continues on the next stage of the beta release.

complete.title: Messaging feature built into the wallet
complete.text: Our first project is a decentralized messaging system that runs on the main network. At this early stage and implementation, It will allow users to share information by chatting right from the client and discuss & share information. We consider the messaging system to be another backbone of other subchain features we plan on releasing.
